about_the_game:
Wander haunted halls as an office temp and collect magical cards with supernatural abilities to fight demons and save the office from being dragged to hell in this horror, deckbuilding, roguelike game.

A Deckbuilding Horror Roguelike

Collect cards that grant abilities and setbacks as you explore the never ending corporate underworld. There are many cards within the devils deck to find in these backrooms but you'll need to choose wisely what you keep in your hand.

Slay Endless Demons

Armed with pistols, magic, and the heads of other interns, fight your way through demons and the souls of former office creeps as you find your way back to the mortal plane.

Escape The Underworld With Friends

Save your soul alone, or with friends. Combine your powers and work together to escape from the underworld.
detailed_description:
Wander haunted halls as an office temp and collect magical cards with supernatural abilities to fight demons and save the office from being dragged to hell in this horror, deckbuilding, roguelike game.

A Deckbuilding Horror Roguelike

Collect cards that grant abilities and setbacks as you explore the never ending corporate underworld. There are many cards within the devils deck to find in these backrooms but you'll need to choose wisely what you keep in your hand.

Slay Endless Demons

Armed with pistols, magic, and the heads of other interns, fight your way through demons and the souls of former office creeps as you find your way back to the mortal plane.

Escape The Underworld With Friends

Save your soul alone, or with friends. Combine your powers and work together to escape from the underworld.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (Most distributions should work)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD A4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (Or later)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD A6
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS El Captain
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2.7 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: Cards We're Dealt Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD A4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD A6
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Wander haunted halls as an office temp and collect magical cards with supernatural abilities to fight demons and save the office from being dragged to hell in this horror, deckbuilding, roguelike game.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
